summary: ProductFormModal was updated to derive Product Name dropdown options from backend products (via useProducts) and to memoize/sort unique names. Due to truncation, the implementation details for loading/error UI handling and dropdown scroll constraints cannot be fully verified from the provided snippet, though the diff summary text claims they exist. Unrequested updates were made to project_state.json tracking metadata.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project_state.json to add new_feature_requests entries (AR-1/AR-2/AR-3) and mark them pending.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest did not request changes to project tracking/state files; it only specified frontend behavior changes in ProductFormModal.
